ops.description:
showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:20}); // Man
“How is it? You having fun?”{PAUSE}“Mmm, so, you ARE having fun.
Well, good, good for you boy.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:21}); // {Cloud}
“My name's {Cloud}.
And stop calling me boy.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:22}); // Dio
“Mmm? Me?
I'm the owner of the Gold Saucer.
The name's Dio.{PAUSE}“Just call me 'Dio'.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:26}); // Dio
“Oh, so you do know?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:25}); // Dio
“Ha ha ha…that, I say, that's
a good one, boy! But it's not
good to lie. You can't fool me.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:28}); // Dio
“Well, a while back, a boy your age
came in and asked me if I had
'Black Materia.'”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:29}); // Dio
“I thought you might know who he was,
seein' as how you're both
about the same age.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:30}); // {Cloud}
“Did he happen to have…a black cape?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:31}); // Dio
“Why yes, yes indeed.
And a tattoo on his hand
that said '1'.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:33}); // Dio
“Ha ha ha, I have no idea.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:35}); // Dio
“I say, stop by the Battle Arena
if you like, boy.”{PAUSE}“You'll probably like it.
Many of my collections
are on display there.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:2}); // “Hey, since the prizes changed,
I got 5000 points again.”
showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:1}); // “Hey, I got 5000 points again.”
showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:0}); // “Hey, I finally got 5000 points.”
showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:1}); // “Hey, I got 5000 points again.”
showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:6}); // “Man, I finally got a prize…”
showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:7}); // “Well, I guess I'll go and get some more GP.”
showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:13}); // “Come on now, no running.”
showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:14}); // “Now, now, be careful of Meteor.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:8}); // “First, I gotta memorize
the order it comes out,
and then guess on the attacks…
…mumble, mumble…”

ops.raw: a5 00 00 f4 ff dc fa bf ff 28 00

ops.description: showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:16}); // “Welcome to the Gold Saucer.”

dialogStrings:
“Hey, since the prizes changed,
I got 5000 points again.”
“Well, I guess I'll go and get some more GP.”

“First, I gotta memorize
the order it comes out,
and then guess on the attacks…
…mumble, mumble…”

“We have to be careful
of these steps.”

Man
“How is it? You having fun?”{PAUSE}“Mmm, so, you ARE having fun.
Well, good, good for you boy.”

{Cloud}
“My name's {Cloud}.
And stop calling me boy.”

Dio
“Mmm? Me?
I'm the owner of the Gold Saucer.
The name's Dio.{PAUSE}“Just call me 'Dio'.”

Dio
“By the way, boy,
do you know what a 'Black Materia' is?”{PAUSE}{CHOICE}Yeah, I know
{CHOICE}What is it?

Dio
“Ha ha ha…that, I say, that's
a good one, boy! But it's not
good to lie. You can't fool me.”

Dio
“Well, a while back, a boy your age
came in and asked me if I had
'Black Materia.'”

Dio
“I thought you might know who he was,
seein' as how you're both
about the same age.”

{Cloud}
“Did he happen to have…a black cape?”

Dio
“Why yes, yes indeed.
And a tattoo on his hand
that said '1'.”

Dio
“Ha ha ha, I have no idea.”

Dio
“I say, stop by the Battle Arena
if you like, boy.”{PAUSE}“You'll probably like it.
Many of my collections
are on display there.”
